name: 8 Ball Pool - Pool Legends
description:
Pool Legends is a new experience of the 8 Ball Online game. You can show your level by challenging other players and the ranking is based on the standard ELO scoring system.

• POOL LEGENDS's FEATURES •
- Challenge billion of pool fans worldwide.
- Elo score can use the player's level. Difficultly challenge with higher ELO score.
- Update leaderboard in country and global.
- Customize your cue and table.
- Chat with your opponents and friends while playing.
- International standard law.
- Auto create table and random the same opponent.
- The feel is like playing on real table with smooth animation.
- Total download free.

Choose a cue and PLAY NOW! You can become a Legend

Follow us and regularly update event at fan page: www.facebook.com/poollegendsgame
